sectionTitle.main: In everything we do, we aim to make life easier.

intro: At Putti, we build custom web and app solutions that aren’t just the best in tech – they’re also the best fit for you, your business and your customers.
firstpara: From business applications to ERP solutions that modernise and streamline your operations, and from award-winning customer apps to complete privacy and security safeguards, we make digital transformations happen.
secondpara: At Putti, we simplify the complex.

callToAction.title: Let’s start making something awesome!
callToAction.buttonClass: px-6 py-2 text-white bg-green hover:bg-green-700 rounded-lg transition duration-200
